name: Alfredo Sauce
description: An easy recipe to make alfredo sauce, that can be served or used with any type of pasta!

steps.instruction: Add butter and cream to a non-stick pan over medium heat until the butter is fully melted.
Add garlic, italian seasonings, salt and pepper into the pan and stir until thoroughly mixed.
Simmer and cook for 3-4 minutes until the sauce is thickened.
Once thickened, add parmesan cheese into the mixture and stir.
